channel.title: Design on Pascal Michaillat
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Pascal Michaillat

item.title: Minimalist Template for Academic Papers
item.description: This template produces a minimalist academic paper with LaTeX.

item.title: Minimalist Template for Academic Presentations
item.description: This template produces a minimalist academic presentation with LaTeX Beamer.

item.title: Minimalist Template for Academic Websites
item.description: This template produces a minimalist academic website with Hugo, Papermod, and GitHub Pages.

item.title: LaTeX Commands to Typeset Math
item.description: This style file collects LaTeX commands to easily typeset mathematical expressions, and easily read them.

item.title: LaTeX Style File to Format Bibliographies
item.description: This style file formats bibliographies stored in BibTeX files and produced by LaTeX documents.
